original_text: I will bring an army to attack you. There will be soldiers all round the city so that nobody can leave. I will build strong towers against the city's walls.
korean_text: 내가 너를 사면으로 둘러 진을 치며 너를 에워 대를 쌓아 너를 치리니

sentences.original_text: I will bring an army to attack you.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 공격하기 위해 군대를 데려오겠다.

sentences.original_text: There will be soldiers all round the city
